long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple app that will bug you every time you open a new tab with the pending Github PR's that haven't been merged or need your review.
Github PRs allows you to connect directly with Github.
You will need to create a Github Token and grant access for reading the repositories you want to track.
https://docs.github.com/en/authentication/keeping-your-account-and-data-secure/creating-a-personal-access-token

More updates coming soon...
